entry.source: They say that the {F804,5}Wicker Man{F804,0} stuffs a human{F801}inside itself, then sets itself on fire, killing{F801}them both... A horde of these horrifying demons{F801}has been attacking people in Shinjuku. A bunch{F801}of us are going to meet up to fight them. Meet{F801}me at {F804,5}the bus terminal in Shinjuku Station's{F801}West Entrance Building district{F804,0} right now!{F801}Don't go to the bus terminal right next to{F801}the west gate - that's the wrong one!{F801}
